snippet: The officers were killed Monday during a protest near Bahrain’s capital, Manama, while trying to disperse a group of protesters who were blocking road, the Interior Ministry said.
abstract: Explosion kills three police officers during a protest near Manama, capital of Bahrain.
lead_paragraph: The officers were killed Monday during a protest near Bahrain’s capital, Manama, while trying to disperse a group of protesters who were blocking road, the Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Bahrain: Explosion Kills 3 Police Officers, Ministry Says
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Explosion Kills 3 Policemen, Ministry Says
